body_html:
Hi,
Yeah, I did it. My Ubuntu crashed because I followed this:
https://askubuntu.com/questions/149206/how-to-install-nvidia-run

I installed Ubuntu all over again, created new conda environment and used caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7. Still getting the warning.

body:
Hi,
Yeah, I did it. My Ubuntu crashed because I followed this:
https://askubuntu.com/questions/149206/how-to-install-nvidia-run

I installed Ubuntu all over again, created new conda environment and used `caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7`. Still getting the warning.
